mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE(STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_ADDRESS, STORE_DETAIL_ADDRESS, STORE_PHONE, BUSINESS_HOURS, STORE_REGION_NO, STORE_INFO) VALUES(SEQ_STORE.NEXTVAL, #{storeName}, #{storeAddress}, #{storeDetailAddress}, #{storePhone}, #{businessHours}, #{storeRegionNo}, #{storeInfo})
INSERT INTO STORE_ATTA(ATTACHMENT_NO, CHANGER_NAME, FILE_LEVEL, STORE_NO) VALUES(SEQ_STORE_ATTA.NEXTVAL, #{changerName}, #{fileLevel}, SEQ_STORE.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STORE ORDER BY STORE_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE STORE SET STORE_NAME = #{storeName}, STORE_ADDRESS = #{storeAddress}, STORE_DETAIL_ADDRESS = #{storeDetailAddress}, STORE_PHONE = #{storePhone}, BUSINESS_HOURS = #{businessHours}, STORE_REGION_NO = #{storeRegionNo}, STORE_INFO = #{storeInfo} WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
